cherryriver.name: Cherry River
cherryriver.description: A needle made out from a red gem taken from Cherry River, a place known for gemstones.

kranos.name: Kranos
kranos.description: A red needle with a white spiral hilt  covered by several sealing stones that display the story of Quadrado and the journey of the Great Warriors.

blackmarch.name: Black March
blackmarch.description: A jet black needle that is extremely thin with a slightly thicker handle.

lecalicus.name: Lecalicus
lecalicus.description: A needle received for passing the Head Pupil's test in The Workshop.

greenapril.name: Green April
greenapril.description: A green hook that is capable of elongating.
